definitions.definition: An instrument or device for domestic use, especially in the kitchen .
examples: We have convenient storage for all the kitchen/eating utensils .

definitions.definition: A useful small tool, implement, or vessel.
examples: He stocked up on old-style writing utensils .

main_definition: An instrument or device for domestic use, especially in the kitchen .
secondary_definitions: A useful small tool, implement, or vessel.
